member.summary: This class defines the parameters required to call .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the transaction.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.OriginalRequestNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the original request number (aka AuthorizationCode or AuthorizationNumber). Only applies to reference transactions (Capture, Void, Credit), this is the request number of the original Authorization you are Capturing or Voiding or the Sale you are Crediting.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.OriginalRequestToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the original request token (aka PNRef or ReferenceNumber). Only applies to reference transactions (Capture, Void, Credit), this is the request token of the original Authorization you are Capturing or Voiding or the Sale you are Crediting.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.ReferenceNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference number (Order Number, Invoice Number etc... what you want this payment to reference).

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.CurrencyCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the currency code.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.BillToId
member.summary: Gets or sets the BillTo Id (leave null for the current BillTo).

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.ShipToId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ShipTo Id (leave null for the current ShipTo).

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.PaymentProfileId
member.summary: Gets or sets the stored payment profile identifier. Only applies to payments being made with a stored payment profile.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.CreditCard
member.summary: Gets or sets the credit card if not using a stored payment profile.

member.name: P:Insite.Payments.Services.Parameters.AddPaymentTransactionParameter.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount for this payment.
